description:
Ever heard of a far-away ghost town east of the Sierra Nevada mountain range called Bodie? You have now. It gets cold there during fall and winter, which is why we dedicated this cozy active jacket for men to this former gold-mining town.

Soft to the touch and featuring an elevated waffle knit, the Bodie Jacket has a clean styling that makes it an easy top to throw in your pack as you head out on adventure. Because we know, adventure is always on your mind...
name: Prana Bodie Hoodie - Mens
